lom:description.lom:string:
Abstract: In an effort to enhance learning in the engineering science classroom, several instructional techniques, including mindor concept mapping, a variation of the one minute paper termed a âdiscovery sheet,â and the inclusion of discussion of the nature of scientific paradigm shifts, which have been used successfully are described. A cast study is also included.
<citation>George D. Catalano; Some Ideas on the teaching of egineering science: A student centered approach; Journal of Engineering Education; 84; 1; 1-3; 1995</citation>
